name: Ch9BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Natasha;All right, that should do it.
speak;Seth;Thank you, lady Natasha.|This feels better already.
speak;Natasha;That was such a terrible wound...|It's a miracle you survived, General.
speak;Seth;Is that so?|I've barely had the time to think about it, I suppose.
speak;Natasha;Well, please take care of yourself.
speak;Natasha;I would hate to see any more people hurt...
speak;Seth;This is war...|But I will do my best to end it quickly.
speak;Natasha;Oh!|I just remembered!|I was told to give this to you when you had recovered some!|It's your signature lance, if I'm not mistaken?
speak;Seth;Regal River, my old friend!|Yes, I believe I should be able to wield this once more.|Thank you, Natasha. This will aid out cause for certain.
speak;Natasha;You're welcome, Sir Seth.|Please, just be careful...
alert;Seth's growths and stats have increased!
alert;Seth can now use his signature lance!
